function explore_box_node_render_unit:ctor(cs_node_unit, node_data)
    super.ctor(self, cs_node_unit, node_data)

    super.dispose(self)

---显示列表元素
---@protected override
function explore_box_node_render_unit:show_item()
    --super.show_item(self)
    
    ---@type ExploreTreasureBox
    local box_data = data.get(tables.ExploreTreasureBox.name, self.node_data.node.EventParam)
    self.node_icon = box_data.LockIcon
    ---@type string
    self.un_lock_icon = box_data.UnLockIcon
    
    self:update_item()
end

---刷新Item
---@public
function explore_box_node_render_unit:update_item()
    if self.node_data.state <= 0 then
        self.is_lock = true
    elseif self.node_data.state == 1 then
        self.is_lock = false
        self.is_box_lock = true
        ---@type ExploreTreasureBox
        local box_data = data.get(tables.ExploreTreasureBox.name, self.node_data.node.EventParam)
        self:play_box_effect(box_data.EffectID)
    elseif self.node_data.state == 2 then
        self.is_lock = false
        self.is_box_lock = false
        self:unload_effect()
    end
end

---设置节点显/隐
---@protected override
---@param is_active boolean
function explore_box_node_render_unit:set_active(is_active)
    self.cs_unit:SetActive(is_active)
    self:update_item()
end

---@public
function explore_box_node_render_unit:play_active_effect()
    if not string.is_nil_or_empty(self.node_data.node.Effect) then
        self.effect_id = effect.play_effect_async(self.node_data.node.Effect, self.obj, 1)
    end
end

---播放宝箱特效
---@private
function explore_box_node_render_unit:play_box_effect(id)
    if nil == self.box_effect then
        if not string.is_nil_or_empty(id) then
            self.box_effect = id
        end
    end
end

---卸载特效
---@private
function explore_box_node_render_unit:unload_effect()
    if nil ~= self.box_effect then
        self.box_effect = nil
    end
end
